title: wtb: Early year cobb postcards (m101-3, dietsche fielding, etc.
author: sportscardpete

posts.post_title: wtb: Early year cobb postcards (m101-3, dietsche fielding, etc.
posts.post_content: Please pm or email me at [url]pianni89@gmail.com[/url] if you have one available, thanks!
lots of cobb postcard regrets, pete!  sorry!  prices have gone mad and rare cobb pc's have dried up...as have many other issues!  Good luck!
pete those are beauties congrats! And for sure! don't blame collectors there are a bunch of great poses.
couldn't hang at heritage, but bumping in the event someone has a lower grade one available.
bump, broadening criteria, still looking, thanks!
hi pete - looking to buy if you've got one! PM me or [url]stephenameyers@gmail.com[/url] thanks!

saw your bump- Did you get any from memory lane last night.
They had Cobb 'fielding pose" go for 73K & they had
the "Wolverine" ----that i wanted a time or so ago. It went for 32K
WOW- how prices gone up.   
Hope you find one.
I had bids on both but underestimated what they would go for - it’s a struggle with a lot of hindsight regret!
